colorTheory.description: The color palette combines a cool primary blue with a clean white background and vibrant red accent for visual interest.
colorTheory.mood: The palette evokes a sense of professionalism and clarity with a touch of energy.
colorTheory.accessibility: The high contrast between the black text and white background ensures readability, while the accent color provides visual hierarchy.
colorTheory.colorRelationships: The primary blue and white create a clean and modern look, with the red accent adding a pop of color.
